alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 13 at 4:54AM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 65 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of central and southwest Montana. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The period of coldest, and most extreme, wind chills are expected through this morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Madison River Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Missouri Headwaters
